props.disabled: Puts all children components into a disabled state
props.modelValue: Represents the selected item(s). Will be an array if **multiple** prop is used.
props.mandatory: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).
props.max: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.
props.multiple: Allows one to select mulitple items.
props.value: The value used when the component is selected within a group. If not provided, the render index is used
